demolition

Class YellowEnemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.GamePlayer
      • demolition.YellowEnemy

  • public class YellowEnemy
extends GamePlayer
    This class represents the yellow enemy character in the demolition game. It can move along the empty tile in the map and it cannot move along Solid wall or broken wall in the game map. It's moving pattern is pre-determined by the program and it tries to move clockwise in the map. For example, If its going down and hits the wall then it tries to move left or it was moving left and hits the wall then it wil try to move up and so on. It can be destroyed by the bomb's explosion. When it collides with bomb guy, bomb guy loses life and current level of the game is reset.
